content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, I'm glad you like the apartment. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that the apartment is new and has a good location. However, I am a student and I have a limited budget. I am looking for the lowest price possible. How much is your initial price for the rental of the apartment?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I am aware that the apartment is in a prime location and has a lot to offer. My initial price is €1000 per month. I am open to negotiations, but I want to make sure that I am compensated fairly for the quality of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. However, as a student, I have a limited budget. I am willing to pay €800 per month for the apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your offer, Emilia. However, I believe that €800 is too low for this apartment. It is in the city center, close to all important facilities, and it is newly built. I am willing to negotiate, but I am looking for a price that reflects the quality of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. However, as a student, I have a limited budget. I am willing to pay €900 per month for the apartment. I believe this is a fair price for a student like me.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to increase your offer, Emilia. However, €900 per month is still too low for this apartment. I understand that you are a student, but I am looking for a price that reflects the quality of the apartment. I am willing to negotiate, but I feel that €900 is not enough.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. However, as a student, I have a limited budget. I am willing to pay €950 per month for the apartment. I believe this is a fair price for a student like me.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

I understand that you are a student, but I am looking for a price that reflects the quality of the apartment. I am willing to negotiate, but I feel that €950 is not enough.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
